page.title: 14The Gun Room, Otford.
page.content: Lowrie's Otford Gunroom opens from 9.00 am. to 5.30 pm and used to be a hardware shop. It sells mostly rifles but quite a few air-rifles. The most powerful gun stocked was a .270 calibre shotgun. The most expensive gun cost #2650 and the cheapest was a #15. air- rifle. They sell about 2000 clay pigeons a week and occasionally sell a crossbow. They do not sell any fishing tackle or riding tack but they do sell country clothing. Customers come from a large area around Otford. Shortly they are going to cease to sell guns but just to repair them in a workshop at the back. The shop front is to be let.
